subject: Sales
title: Your Name Is Your Brand
description: A 60-second lesson on Your Name Is Your Brand.

hook.text: A buyer sees your name and decides in two seconds whether to answer. That's your brand talking.

buildup.text: Personal brand is what people say about you when you leave the room. It's your reputation distilled.

discovery.text: Top sellers are recognized by name across their industry. Their brand opens doors before they pitch.

twist.text: You have a personal brand whether you build one or not. The only question is whether you control it.

climax.text: Invest in your name intentionally. Every interaction, email, and post either builds or erodes your brand.

punchline.text: Your name is your brand. Guard it like currency.

quiz.question: What is a personal brand in sales?
options: What people say about you when you leave the room
